name: Switches Brew
description:
tiny match-3 game made for the Wholesome Games August Prompt - witchy drinks!

assets used:

Kyrise's free RPG Icon Pack: https://kyrise.itch.io/kyrises-free-16x16-rpg-icon-pack

JDWasabi's 8-bit/16-bit SFX pack: https://jdwasabi.itch.io/8-bit-16-bit-sound-effects-pack

GooseNinja's Minimalistic Loops: https://gooseninja.itch.io/minimalistc-loops

Madder's Simple UI Pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/simple-ui-icons-147101
